name: Cirno's Strange Dream
description:
little ice fairy taking a good ol nap while it's raining outside.

she's dreaming about fighting fairies and other weird creatures (but mostly fairies)

...

that's it really.. this game doesn't have a story.

this is a touhou fan-game! enjoy.

there are probably still some bugs in this game but i tried my best to fix all of the bugs that i could.

game play time: ⑨ minutes

actual play time: depends on your skills idk
